  googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
      try {
        if(event.slot == medium_rectangle2 && event.isEmpty){
          ads_mr2_remove();
          console.log(event);

          console.log(e);

  });

    googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
    googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs(true);
    googletag.enableServices();
  });

  function refreshPositionSlot(slot) {
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

        function refreshSlotDfp(pos) {
          var label = {
            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',
            topframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560493042615-0',
            bottomframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492587611-0',
            mediumrectangle1: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842041944-0',
            mediumrectangle2: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842124377-0',
            horizontal: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492858703-0'  
          }
          if (typeof label[pos] != "undefined") {
            refreshPositionSlot(label[pos]);
          }
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

</script></div><div class="jsx-489929435 beauty-market-desktop-button"><div id="floating-tokped" class="campaign-button-wrapper"><button class="close-campaign"><span></span><span></span></button><a href="/beauty-market?brand=&amp;cat_id=&amp;cat_slugs=&amp;order=popular&amp;page=1" target="_blank"><img src="//static.femaledaily.com/web-assets/beauty-market/FD-BeautyMarket+New-02.png" class="campaign-button"></a><style>

  function refreshPositionSlot(slot) {
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

        function refreshSlotDfp(pos) {
          var label = {
            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',
            topframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560493042615-0',
            bottomframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492587611-0',
            mediumrectangle1: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842041944-0',
            mediumrectangle2: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842124377-0',
            horizontal: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492858703-0'  
          }
          if (typeof label[pos] != "undefined") {
            refreshPositionSlot(label[pos]);
          }
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

        function refreshSlotDfp(pos) {
          var label = {
            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',
            topframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560493042615-0',
            bottomframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492587611-0',

            horizontal: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492858703-0'  
          }
          if (typeof label[pos] != "undefined") {
            refreshPositionSlot(label[pos]);
          }
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

/* S- Custom DFP For Callback Function */

  googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
      try {
        if(event.slot == medium_rectangle2 && event.isEmpty){
          ads_mr2_remove();
          console.log(event);
        }

        if(event.slot == billboard_dfp){
          console.log(event);
        }
      } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
      }
  });
  /*E- Custom DFP */
    googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
    googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs(true);
    googletag.enableServices();
  });

  function refreshPositionSlot(slot) {
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

        function refreshSlotDfp(pos) {
          var label = {
            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',
            topframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560493042615-0',
            bottomframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492587611-0',
            mediumrectangle1: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842041944-0',
            mediumrectangle2: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842124377-0',
            horizontal: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492858703-0'  
          }
          if (typeof label[pos] != "undefined") {
            refreshPositionSlot(label[pos]);
          }
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

</script></div><div class="jsx-489929435 beauty-market-desktop-button"><div id="floating-tokped" class="campaign-button-wrapper"><button class="close-campaign"><span></span><span></span></button><a href="/beauty-market?brand=&amp;cat_id=&amp;cat_slugs=&amp;order=popular&amp;page=1" target="_blank"><img src="//static.femaledaily.com/web-assets/beauty-market/FD-BeautyMarket+New-02.png" class="campaign-button"></a><style>

      try {
        if(event.slot == medium_rectangle2 && event.isEmpty){
          ads_mr2_remove();

          console.log(event);

          console.log(e);

  });

    googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
    googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs(true);
    googletag.enableServices();
  });

  function refreshPositionSlot(slot) {
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

        function refreshSlotDfp(pos) {
          var label = {
            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',
            topframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560493042615-0',
            bottomframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492587611-0',
            mediumrectangle1: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842041944-0',
            mediumrectangle2: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842124377-0',
            horizontal: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492858703-0'  
          }
          if (typeof label[pos] != "undefined") {
            refreshPositionSlot(label[pos]);
          }
        }

          .review-card-content .cardrv-starlist i {
            font-size: 25px;

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

  function refreshPositionSlot(slot) {
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

        function refreshSlotDfp(pos) {
          var label = {
            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',
            topframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560493042615-0',
            bottomframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492587611-0',

            mediumrectangle2: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842124377-0',
            horizontal: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492858703-0'  
          }
          if (typeof label[pos] != "undefined") {
            refreshPositionSlot(label[pos]);
          }
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

</script></div><div class="jsx-489929435 beauty-market-desktop-button"><div id="floating-tokped" class="campaign-button-wrapper"><button class="close-campaign"><span></span><span></span></button><a href="/beauty-market?brand=&amp;cat_id=&amp;cat_slugs=&amp;order=popular&amp;page=1" target="_blank"><img src="//static.femaledaily.com/web-assets/beauty-market/FD-BeautyMarket+New-02.png" class="campaign-button"></a><style>

          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

That's why I love this product, it's far from pigmented, it needs extra effort to make its color shows up. I never try using this with makeup primer beforehand, it might has better pigmentation with makeup primer beforehand.<br>
The texture is too powdery, the brush within the packaging is not really helps, it has poor quality but I keep using it :p<br>
Though it's not pigmented, but for me it's a plus because it gives natural blush on my face.<br>
I use shade "carnation bloom".<br>
It has shimmer but not too shimmery so it gives natural glow on my cheeck. Me likey...</span></p><style>

Pigmentasinya kurang ya, tekstur juga powdery jadi setiap kali pakai harus di build beberapa kali. Staying powernya payah, sekitar 2 / 3 jam, kalau keringetan lebih cepat lagi bubar jalannya.<br>
Brush-nya kecil banget, yah tipe-tipe brush bawaan blush on kayaknya ukurannya memang sekitaran segini yaa.. Jadi kurang tepat juga untuk dijadikan bahan komplain.<br>
Aku prefer pake brush khusus blush on, biar lebih menghemat waktu. Kalau kepepet dan terpaksa pake brush bawaan, biasanya brushnya aku teken nagian tengahnya ke permukaan datar dulu baru diaplikasiin ke muka. Soalnya kalau pakai tangan, malah cemong. :D</span></p><style>
          .review-card-content .cardrv-starlist i {
            font-size: 25px;
            color: rgba(219, 40, 78, 0.32);
          }

          .review-card-content .cardrv-starlist i.margin-right {

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

  function refreshPositionSlot(slot) {
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
            var displaySlot = googletag.display(slot);
            googletag.pubads().refresh([displaySlot]);
          });
        }

        function refreshSlotDfp(pos) {
          var label = {
            billboard: 'div-gpt-ad-1560841072529-0',
            topframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560493042615-0',
            bottomframe: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492587611-0',
            mediumrectangle1: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842041944-0',
            mediumrectangle2: 'div-gpt-ad-1560842124377-0',
            horizontal: 'div-gpt-ad-1560492858703-0'  
          }
          if (typeof label[pos] != "undefined") {
            refreshPositionSlot(label[pos]);
          }
        }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}

</script></div><div class="jsx-489929435 beauty-market-desktop-button"><div id="floating-tokped" class="campaign-button-wrapper"><button class="close-campaign"><span></span><span></span></button><a href="/beauty-market?brand=&amp;cat_id=&amp;cat_slugs=&amp;order=popular&amp;page=1" target="_blank"><img src="//static.femaledaily.com/web-assets/beauty-market/FD-BeautyMarket+New-02.png" class="campaign-button"></a><style>

                      bottom: 130px;

                    }

                    .beauty-market-desktop-button .ads-visible {
                      bottom: 60px;
                    }

                      bottom: 115px;
                    }

            }

<script>
var loadScriptAsync = function(uri){
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    var tag = document.createElement('script');
    tag.src = uri;
    tag.async = true;
    tag.onload = () => {
      resolve();
    };
  var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
});
}
var scriptLoaded = loadScriptAsync('https://newrevive.detik.com/delivery/asyncjs.php');

scriptLoaded.then(function(){
 window.reviveAsync["0cceecb9cae9f51a31123c541910d59b"].addEventListener('afterRenderBanner',rvCallbackBanner);

 function rvCallbackBanner(data){

  for(i=0;i<data.detail.length;i++){
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(true),true);
    checkBannerAvailable(data.detail[i], 3644,detectMR2(false),false);
 }}
});

function checkBannerAvailable(dataDetail, checkZone, callFunc, available = false){
	try {
		var show = available ? 1 : 0;
		if(show == 0){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid == show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
        if(show == 1){
          if (dataDetail.zoneid == checkZone && dataDetail.bannerid >= show) {
            callFunc;
            console.log('zone id adjustment : ' + checkZone);
          }
        }
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(e);
	}
}
